data.name: InvalidLogin
data.value: There was a problem accessing the database. Please ensure user name '%1' exists and that you have entered the correct password. Please also ensure that the database '%2' also exists on the server.

data.name: InvalidServer
data.value: There was a problem accessing the database server '%1', please ensure that the server name exists on the network and that access to it is available.

data.name: MissingDatabase
data.value: Database '%1' may be missing from the database server, please ensure that it does exist and that user '%2' can access the server.

data.name: DeniedPermissions
data.value: User '%1' does not have permissions to view data in a required table please give '%1' permission to the relevant tables. View the extended error information to work out what permissions are needed on what tables.

data.name: UnSupportedDataProvider
data.value: Data provider / server type '%1' is not supported by this current version of OMS.
